reviews.name: RUCHI SHARMA
reviews.text:
Our Founder and CEO, Dr Ruchi Sharma, is one to watch entrepreneurs of 2020 in the UK. The award recognizes people setting the standards in cutting-edge innovation and entrepreneurship in Cambridge, often known as the Silicon Valley of the United Kingdom.
Dr Sharma obtained a PhD from the world-renowned Roslin Institute at the University of Edinburgh, followed by a post-doctorate in the exciting field of cellular reprogramming at the University of Cambridge. With a firm focus on partnerships and collaboration, Dr Sharma firmly believes that we can create a better world.

reviews.name: Dr. David Hay
reviews.text:
A Professor of Tissue Engineering at the University of Edinburgh, co-Founder and Director Dr David Hay has earned a long-standing reputation for his work in stem cell biology and hepatocyte differentiation. Dr Hay believes that a trans-disciplinary approach is needed to solve the failings that currently exist in the cell microenviornment.
Dr Hay with extensive industry network is actively involved in the translation of stem cell derived hepatocytes into scalable manufacturing processes, by defining culture conditions and developing physiologically relevant models.
